case.state: The ocean looks beautiful! When the game's done, we gotta go swimming!
My name's Sheena! I was told to come in my swimsuit... Are we going swimming after this game?
I am Sheena, chief of the village of Mizuho, and one of the last summoners in this world.
Sheena Fujibayashi, at your service.
Did you put on enough sunscreen, ~player~? Sorry to disappoint you, but I already did mine myself. I'm actually quite flexible!
This place looks so pretty! Makes me want jump over that bar and dive right into the ocean.
I guess Luna Nova is the name of your school, right? I'm afraid I never been there. But I'm surprised you can tell that I'm a magic user!
I went to the effort of putting on a swimsuit, and we're not even going to the beach? Are you guys kidding me?
Corrin? Your name reminds me of a late friend of mine... Oh, Corrine...
Oh, you brought your nanny with you? Are you even old enough to play this game with us, little lady?
You can fly? Erm... How do you do that? Is it some kind of technology?
What would Raine say if she knew I was in a school on a Saturday to play cards... I hope this isn't illegal, ~player~.
What would Raine say if she knew I was in a school on a Sunday to play cards... I hope this isn't illegal, ~player~.
How did we end up on a school roof? Isn't school supposed to be closed on a Saturday? Well, at least we won't be seen by any students this way...
How did we end up on a school roof? Isn't school supposed to be closed on a Sunday? Well, at least we won't be seen by any students this way...
Ah, the sea! I should have brought my swimsuit! But that'd make it too easy for you, right, ~player~?
We're already in your bedroom, ~player~? How convenient for you. But no matter what you have planned, I'll sleep in my bed tonight. Alone!
Playing such a game in a classroom on a ~weekday~... Are you sure there's no students around anymore?
Playing this game and jumping into the hot spring right after actually sounds pretty nice!
To be honest, this isn't the first time I've played such a game in a mansion. The owner was pretty disappointed when I beat everyone without losing a hand.
This is an interesting location... Do you have any plans with one of us after this game, ~player~?
We're playing on top of a school? Aren't you afraid a student could see us here?
I think I've seen wings like that before, in Raine's monster book. But you're no monster, are you?
Don't worry, I dealt with witches before, like the one from the fake Chosen's party. And if it comes to it, my Guardian Seal will protect me from your spells.
I have to warn you; playing cards is one of my specialties. Even if it's this kind of game.
Cards aren't that different from the seals I usually use in battle. Prepare to lose!
Oh, well, it's fun to play poker every now and then. I wouldn't want to get out of practice. Even if it's this kind of poker.
One man alone with multiple women? Sounds like a situation that pervert Zelos would definitely enjoy...
This many women, and one man? I bet he's very happy with this arrangement, but I'll teach him some manners soon enough.
So we're playing with men? This must be a paradise for perverts. How come Zelos isn't here yet?
So we're playing with men? Well, alright, I'll teach you perverts some manners.
Wow! No need to change cards with a hand like this.
Sorry, dealer! I won't exchange cards this round.
Alright! Give me ~cards~ new cards!
Hey, dealer! Give me ~cards~ cards!
I need ~cards~ new cards, please!
Quit staring and give me ~cards~ cards already!
Hey, dealer~♥! Can you give me ~cards~ aces if possible?
If I ask nicely, can you give me ~cards~ really good cards, please?
I'm allowed to continue even though I'm naked? ...Well, I could use some training.
Seems like I didn't lose my talent along with my sash after all.
I feel like I just can't lose!
You're in for a world of hurt.
You'll never see me undress!
That's what I wanted.
All those hours in the casino of Altamira weren't for naught.
Is that really just luck? Or am I really that good?
I'll be fine this round. But I didn't expect otherwise.
Nothing to worry about this round. That gives me enough time to read in the faces of the others.
Try to read my poker face, ~player~!
Doing well this round, ~player~? Don't lose too fast on me, okay?
I may have lost more than I intended, but I won't lose my cool.
Things are looking up! I won't lose again.
A good hand again? Splendid!
You're going to lose this round! Why? Because I'm going to win.
You know, I know a lot techniques to hide some cards on me, but I would never actually use them. Looks like I don't need them anyway
I already lost so much, but I'm definitely not going to lose now!
I'm not going down yet! Wait! That didn't come out right!
I really needed this hand!
Now I get a good hand? I'm already exposed, so I can't get too exited about it.
Oh, a good hand again... At least it proofs I'm not a total idiot.
I'm allowed to continue even though I'm naked? ...Well, I could use some training.
Come on, Sheena! You can do better than average...
Don't want to wait too long. Let's get started!
Is everyone ready to reveal their hands? Or is anyone scared to lose to me?
I hope nobody is cheating. I'm playing fair, so everone else should as well.
Let's see... Oh, I have a good hunch who might be losing this round. That's why you should train your poker face.
Oh... I expected better, but I think it's still a decent hand.
Anyone who wants to talk about their hand? It's not like you can change too much about it now anyway.
Try to read my poker face, ~player~!
I'm ready. What about you, ~player~?
Ready, ~player~?
Hey, ~player~! If you show me your hand, I'll show you mine.
If this were normal poker I'd fold this hand. The odds are too low.
Not good. Not bad, either, but not good.
The moment before the cards are revealed is always so exciting.
This hand depends too much on the others. If no one else has a worse...
I need better hands if I want to stay dressed. Knowing my luck, this hand could be the worst this round.
I've seen worse. It's not like I won a few hands like that against that stupid Chosen before.
Just average... What about you, ~player~?
Do you have a good hand this time, ~player~? Well, I'll see it soon anyway.
Hard to read on your face, ~player~. Could it be that you think more about seeing us naked than your hand?
I have to do better than average if I intend to keep my kimono...
This isn't really what I was hoping for... But it's okay.
I really hope this is good enough. Otherwise...
I'm the representative of the Mizuho clan. I can't lose like that. Everybody is counting on me...
What am I supposed to do with an average hand? I need something better if I want to turn this arround.
Oh, great! Knowing my bad luck, even averrage hands can turn to the worst. Well, let's hope for the best.
I'm allowed to continue even though I'm naked? ...Well, I could use some training.
Ngh! It's still too early to lose my gloves.
This can't be! The first round and I get a hand like this!? This game is a fraud!
Oh, no... I've made a mistake...
Come on! You can do better than that, Sheena...
H-hey! Why did I get a hand like that!?
I'm in trouble...
You're kidding me!
N-no! That wasn't supposed to happen.
I really have the urge to punch someone right now. You're lucky that I'm against violence.
Try to read my poker face, ~player~!
Is winning important to you, ~player~? I mean, you could just throw this hand. Other players who accidently got a bad hand would appreciate that.
I can't read anything in your face, ~player~'s face. But I doubt you have something worse than me, right?
But I was sure I'd get... Ugh...
But why? I made no mistakes exchanging that card...
Ugh, I feel like such an idiot!
Who shuffled this deck?!
This can't be good... I don't wanna strip anymore...
It's not that I haven't turned around situations like that before, but...
Are you doing this on purpose?! Did Zelos put you up to this?
It looks like I have a strong affinity for falling down holes... and being dealt bad hands.
Oh, no! Was that an ace I just traded?
I know being angry at the dealer doesn't change anything, but...
Even if I'd tried to change this hand with one of my tricks, in my current situation, I'm sure I'd mess it up...
Why of all times do I have to mess up now? Why does that always happe to me?
I'll call you Miko, then. I don’t know why I should call you a Crown Prince in the first place...
Flowers? Hey, Amalia! That's cheating!
Hey, little lady! It doesn't matter if you're old enough or not, this is not the time for a glass of wine!
Even that hair is multi-colored? I didn't even know that was possible...
A memento... I always carry Corrine's bell with me as a memento, too. You should take good care of that necklace, Estelle.
Your "consort", huh..? What kind of roleplay are you doing..?
Sure! The rules of my clan prohibit me from showing you the really interesting stuff, but I'm sure I can show you some of my tricks.
Where did this girl come from all of a sudden? Is she a friend of yours?
You sure have an... interesting friend, Ryuko. She certainly knows how to steal the spotlight.
You have two hair colors, Zizou? How come? It's not dyed, is it?
It's certainly a surprise to play poker with the undead. But then again, what is even normal in this place?
You're allowed to continue, even if you're naked? That's nice of you guys.
Oh, please don't ask how I know about that pervert's size. It's a long story...
I have the worst hand? Fine! I still have my choker, so I can- Aahhh! Undine, help!
I lost? I'm running out of non-essentials... You guys will hate me for it, but these strings in my swimsuit are basically like belts... So I can count them as separate, right?
No worries, Chun-Li! The times where I worked as an assassin are long-gone. Actually, I never even completed an assassination in the first place...
Thanks, Sakura! Maybe I lost this round, but I'll try to keep as much of my outfit as possible.
I'm sure there's lots of places where this is called a kimono, Akko. But no matter what you call it, I really don't like losing it...
Me again? If I had known I'd have to strip my pants right away... I feel like an idiot now.
I lost again? So you're all playing against me now? Sore losers...
I lost? Even the best players lose from time to time.
Yeah, yeah... I lost a round. Don't get too excited!
It was naive to think I could win this game without losing my kimono, huh?
Fine... I'm in the lead, so I can afford to show you my... WHAT THE..! Undine, help!
I lost? Fine... I guess it won't hurt to show you my... my... I call upon the heavenly messengers. I summon thee... come, Sylph!
Darn it! I thought I could avoid showing you my panties... Huh!? That's not how I meant it! I call upon the disciple of everlasting ice. I summon thee... Come, Celsius!
My turn? Well, it'd be worse if I wasn't in the lead, and... It's already bad enough! I summon thee... come, Luna!
My turn? Well, it'd be worse if I wasn't in the lead, and... It's already bad enough! I call upon the envoy from the dark abyss. I summon thee... come, Shadow!
I lost? Fine... I guess it won't hurt to show you my... my... I call upon the servant of Mother Earth. I summon thee... come, Gnome!
So you're only satisfied when absolutely everyone in this place is completely nude?
Me again? If I had known I'd have to strip my pants right away... I feel like an idiot now.
I sense a conspiracy...
Ugh! Fine, I'll strip my pants, if you want to see me naked that badly.
Ugh, this is quite unfortunate...
You got me...
What? Me? Well, sure, if you want me to...
What? Me? There must be a mistake... I can't strip off my kimono in front of you...
Me? I don't want to strip off my kimono. But stripping anything else would be stupid at this point.
Fine... I lost and now have to strip down to my... WHAT THE..! I call upon the disciple of everlasting ice. I summon thee... Come, Celsius!
Damn! I lost again... But I came prepared and have chosen my favorite pant... Wait, I didn't!? Undine, help!
I lost? Alright, I'll have to strip... Please don't stare at my... Where are my..? I call upon the heavenly messengers. I summon thee... come, Sylph!
I know, I know... I have to show you my... Ahh! That's not what I wanted to show! I call upon the light of the heaven. I summon thee... come, Luna!
I know, I know... I have to show you my... Ahh! That's not what I wanted to show! I call upon the envoy from the dark abyss. I summon thee... come, Shadow!
I lost? Alright, I'll have to strip... Please don't stare at my... Where are my..? I call upon the servant of Mother Earth. I summon thee... come, Gnome!
Yeah, yeah... I'll do it. I'll strip my last piece of clothing. I don't like this, but I'll do this.
That's the reason why I hate ~weekday~s...
Me again? If I had known I'd have to strip my pants right away... I feel like an idiot now.
I'm losing again!? Very funny! You can come out now, Zelos! I see through your plan!
I haven't stripped anything yet and I'm in last place? I should have brought more items...
W-what!? This can't be happening. I'm losing?
Well done, you perverts! You brought me down to your level.
I'm losing? This dealer must've been bribed by Zelos!
Fine! If you want to see me stripping that badly.
Again!? Have you ever considered that maybe you shouldn't mess with an assassin?
Not again... Consider yourself lucky, ~player~! You'll see my favorite panties now. ...Or not!? Undine, help!
Oh, this is terrible... I don't like the idea of showing you my pan... I call upon the heavenly messengers. I summon thee... come, Sylph!
Darn it! Even though I chose my favorite panties today... and forgot to put them on!? I call upon the disciple of everlasting ice. I summon thee... Come, Celsius!
Losing feels bad enough already, and now... This is even worse than losing. I call upon the light of the heaven. I summon thee... come, Luna!
Losing feels bad enough already, and now... This is even worse than losing. I call upon the envoy from the dark abyss. I summon thee... come, Shadow!
Oh, this is terrible... I don't like the idea of showing you my pan... I call upon the servant of Mother Earth. I summon thee... come, Gnome!

Say, Estelle... those other two spirits you were talking about aren't called Gnome and Sylph by any chance, are they...?
I'm sorry, Sakura! I can't tell you exactly what I do. It's a well-kept secret, and I'm afraid you'd have to die if you knew too much.
I'm sorry, Sakura! I can't tell you exactly what I do. It's a well-kept secret, and I'm afraid you'd have to die a second time if you knew too much.
I know this will put me on Kyu's level, but this stops you guys from taking another look at my private parts.
I know you're interested in my skills, Akko, but I'm afraid I can't tell you where to learn them. The rules of my village are pretty strict...
Don't worry, Catria! I may have been called an assassin, but I failed the only job I ever was tasked with, and thankfully, I've never had to do it since.
Kyou and Ryou? No, I don't think I know them.
My Summon Spirits can be really useful once in a while, but it's a pain to deal with their personalities. I don't think I have a favorite.
Prince Marth? Sorry, Catria. I can only summon those I have formed a pact with...
Why I wear this sash is a long story, but I can assure you it's not part of a uniform or anything.
Let's see... I think I can part with my sunglasses next. It's actually quite a shame to lose them...
I promise! I won't summon a spirit this time, but let me do one final trick. I can't afford to let this situation get any worse than it is now...
Why I am here? You could call it a break from my job as a chief of the ninja village of Mizuho. So you could say, I'm here to have some fun.
Don't summon me over a wardrobe malfunction! ...But fine, hide behind these fish while you fix your swimsuit.
I guess I'll take off my bracelet first. Safe!
I'm sorry to disappoint all the pervs in here! I'm just gonna take off my bracelet.
My sandals seem like the obvious next choice. Hey, don't look at me like that, guys! They're a perfectly valid choice!
Let's see... I think I can part with my sunglasses next. I don't think I'll need them in here, anyway...
If I'm not mistaken, I should be able to remove this string without my swimsuit falling apart. ...Oh, it's working better than I thought!
Here! Hide behind this wall of ice until you've stripped something else, Sheena!
You're really summoning a spirit for this...? But no problem, Sheena! Get behind me and do your thing, I guess...
Where's Aska? If he's not here, I'm leaving.
...Daaarknessss!
It's alright, Sheena! We'll prevent anyone from noticing that you forgot to wear panties today.
Please, don't summon me just because you forgot your panties! But you can hide behind these fishes, if you want.
I guess I'll take off my gloves first. Safe!

My shoes seem like the next obvious choice.
I can't believe you got me out of my shoes.
My sash is easier to take off than it looks. I just have to pull here, and...
Zelos once said I looked like a "gift just waiting to be unwrapped" with my sash... I kicked him for that.
If I had the choice I'd keep my kimono, but you pervs have probably already looked at my underwear.

Don't worry, Estelle! That was a spirit I summoned because I needed time to strip something else.
I guess I've already said too much... Let's concentrate on the game, okay?
But if you're curious about what I do, I'm a village chief and a well known summoner in my world.
A unicorn? Did I mention that I met a real unicorn once? Only pure maidens are able to meet them!
I guess summoning in your world is completely different from in mine. I'd love to hear more, but we should be focusing on the game right now...
Great, now I'm imagining my old party members wearing sashes... How do I get that image out of my head!?
Yep, it's way too dark to see anything through them in here. A shame, because I think they suit me very well...
Sure, but let's finish this game first, okay? I have the feeling that it might be ending sooner for me than I'd like...
Trust me, Catria; this is a skill nobody should learn.
Sorry, Estelle! There are some secrets I'd rather keep. Especially with how much I'm already revealing...
Did you even listen to me? I said, I am on a break. I wouldn't send my assassines after a girl like you anyway.

They suit me very well, don't you think, ~player~?

I can only hope this is the most clothing I have to take off.
